roomDescription.name: Cellar
roomDescription.shortDescription: A dark cellar under the basement
roomDescription.longDescription: The lighting of this cellar is very dim, if noticeable at all. The walls are painted clinically white.

doorDescription.name: Wood door
doorDescription.longDescription: The door is made out of old bark and has deep scratch marks on it.
doorDescription.detailedDescription: It appears as if there's remains of human tissue and nails in the grooves of those scratch marks.
doorDescription.insideDescription: Blocking your way upstairs is a wooden door
doorDescription.outsideDescription: Blocking the way to the cellar is an old wooden door. The wood has been thoroughly treated on this side.

itemDescription.name: Iron key
itemDescription.shortDescription: A key, made of cast iron.
itemDescription.longDescription: The key is made from cast iron, which truly has seen better days.
itemDescription.roomDesc: A key is laying on the ground.
itemDescription.inventoryDescription: The iron key feels sturdy in your hands.

roomDescription.name: Basement
roomDescription.longDescription: This tiny room has nothing in it.

doorDescription.name: Wood door
doorDescription.longDescription: The door is made out of old bark and has deep scratch marks on it.
doorDescription.detailedDescription: It appears as if there's remains of human tissue and nails in the grooves of those scratch marks.
doorDescription.insideDescription: Blocking your way upstairs is a wooden door
doorDescription.outsideDescription: Blocking the way to the cellar is an old wooden door. The wood has been thoroughly treated on this side.

roomDescription.name: Outside
roomDescription.longDescription: The freedom of the world is in front of you.
